EmailTemplate.name: TSE: Microsoft Inspire 07_16_18.Microsoft Inspire Follow Up 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for stopping by!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, It was great to catch up with you at Microsoft Inspire this year! It is an exciting time for the partnership between Turbonomic and Microsoft.
As a leading ISV for Azure Assessment, Planning and Optimization engagements, we’d love to share more of our insight with you. Check out our Turbonomic and Microsoft resource center here <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/microsoft-and-turbonomic]]>. It includes a recent video on how we are delivering on our promise of 7 Days to Azure <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/7-days-to-azure]]>.
If you're ready, we'd also love to have a one-on-one conversation with you to learn more about your team and your priorities. With your input, we can take you through a customized demo of our platform and show you exactly where we can help. Please schedule a meeting <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> with us today.
Thank you,
Team Turbonomic
